item.title: OpenAI 启用英国前财长奥斯本领导全球星际之门扩张计划
item.description: OpenAI 公司周二表示，已任命英国前财政大臣乔治-奥斯本（George Osborne）为总经理兼 "OpenAI for Countries "计划负责人，该聊天金沙国际娱乐网址正加紧努力，与各国政府合作制定国家人工智能战略。【原文：OpenAI has appointed former British finance minister George Osborne as managing director and head of its "OpenAI for Countries" initiative, the company said on Tuesday, as the ChatGPT maker ramps up efforts to work with governments on national AI strategies.】

item.title: 华尔街日报》报道：中国要求获得巴拿马港口交易的控股权
item.description: 华尔街日报》周二援引熟悉内情的人士的话报道称，中国已经提高了要求，现在正推动国有船舶运营商中远集团在一项价值 228 亿美元的港口交易中获得控股权，该交易涉及巴拿马运河附近两个有争议的港口。【原文：China has upped its demands and is now pushing for state-owned ship operator Cosco to get a controlling stake in a $22.8 billion ports deal involving two contentious ports near the Panama Canal, The Wall Street Journal reported on Tuesday citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 马斯克 X 被欧盟罚款后，美国威胁采取反制措施
item.description: 特朗普政府周二威胁说，如果欧盟服务提供商继续采取美国贸易代表办公室所称的 "歧视性 "行动，将对其采取一系列报复措施，包括可能收费或限制外国服务。【原文：The Trump administration on Tuesday threatened a wide range of retaliatory measures against EU service providers, including possible fees or restrictions on foreign services, if the firms continue what the USTR called "discriminatory" actions.】

item.title: 特斯拉加大对德国千兆工厂电池芯的投资力度
item.description: 美国汽车制造商特斯拉周二在一份声明中说，特斯拉正在创造条件，从2027年开始，在其位于柏林附近格鲁海德的德国千兆工厂每年生产多达8千兆瓦时的电池芯。【原文：Tesla is creating the conditions to produce up to 8 gigawatt hours of battery cells a year at its German gigafactory in Gruenheide near Berlin starting in 2027, the U.S. automaker said in a statement on Tuesday.】

item.title: 16 个州起诉特朗普政府暂停电动汽车充电基础设施项目
item.description: 由 16 个州和哥伦比亚特区组成的一个团体对特朗普政府提起诉讼，控告其暂停了两项针对电动汽车充电基础设施的两党赠款计划。【原文：A group of 16 states and the District of Columbia filed suit against the Trump administration for suspending two bipartisan grant programs for electric vehicle charging infrastructure.】

item.title: 消费品公司缩短首席执行官任期以促进增长
item.description: 消费品公司更换首席执行官的速度就像运动队更换教练一样快，因为董事会对增长疲软、美国关税不确定性以及与年轻购物者建立联系的挑战失去了耐心。【原文：Consumer goods firms are changing CEOs as fast as sports teams change coaches as boards lose patience with sluggish growth, U.S. tariff uncertainty and the challenge of connecting with younger shoppers.】

item.title: 非洲开发银行为低成本贷款窗口筹集 105 亿美元，美国资金尚无消息
item.description: 非洲开发银行（AfDB）周二表示，该行以优惠条件向低收入国家提供贷款的基金筹集到 105 亿美元，超过了上一轮充资的数字，但未达到最初的目标。【原文：The African Development Bank (AfDB) raised $10.5 billion for its fund that lends money to low-income countries on favourable terms, it said on Tuesday, surpassing the previous replenishment round's figure but falling short of its initial target.】

item.title: 加拿大银行希望稳定币能得到高质量流动资产的支持
item.description: 作者：Promit Mukherjee 和 David Ljunggren【原文：By Promit Mukherjee and David Ljunggren】

item.title: 美国环保局预计在 2026 年第一季度最终确定生物燃料规则
item.description: 美国环境保护局预计将于明年第一季度最终确定 2026 年和 2027 年生物燃料掺混规定。【原文：The U.S. Environmental Protection Agency expects to finalize 2026 and 2027 biofuel blending mandates, which had originally been expected in late October, in the first quarter of next year.】

item.title: Airtel Africa 与 Starlink 合作，在 14 个市场推出直达手机服务
item.description: 非洲电信公司（Airtel Africa）周二表示，该公司已与 SpaceX 合作，向其所有 14 个市场引入 Starlink 的直达蜂窝卫星技术。【原文：Airtel Africa said on Tuesday it has partnered with SpaceX to introduce Starlink's direct-to-cell satellite technology to all its 14 markets.】

item.title: 美国 11 月黑人和青少年失业率飙升
item.description: 美国劳工部周二的数据显示，在经济疲软的情况下，通常最容易失去工作的两个美国群体--黑人和青少年--的失业率在11月份飙升至四年多来的最高水平。【原文：The unemployment rate for two U.S. groups that are often the most vulnerable to job loss in a softening economy - Blacks and teenagers - surged to the highest levels in more than four years in November, Labor Department data showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 即将上任的卡夫亨氏首席执行官表示赞同拆分，但保留改进的权利
item.description: 即将上任的卡夫亨氏首席执行官史蒂夫-卡希莱恩（Steve Cahillane）曾领导过麦片制造商凯洛格（Kellogg），他在接受路透社采访时表示，他赞成公司拆分为两家公司，并 "保留 "改进计划的权利。【原文：Incoming Kraft Heinz CEO Steve Cahillane, who previously led cereal maker Kellogg, said in an interview with Reuters that he endorses the company's split into two companies and "reserves the right" to improve the plans.】

item.title: 消息人士称，环球公司提出出售下城的 Curve 以赢得欧盟批准
item.description: 一位直接了解此事的人士周二表示，环球音乐集团已提出出售版税服务平台 Curve，试图解决欧盟对其 7.75 亿美元竞购 Downtown Music 的竞争问题。【原文：Universal Music Group has offered to sell royalty services platform Curve in an attempt to address EU competition concerns over its $775 million bid for Downtown Music, a person with direct knowledge of the matter said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 现代和起亚同意改装 400 万辆美国汽车以应对威胁问题
item.description: 韩国现代（Hyundai）和起亚（Kia）汽车制造商周二同意对超过 400 万辆美国汽车进行改装，以解决偷盗问题，并在所有新车上安装防盗设备，以解决由 35 位总检察长组成的两党联盟的调查。【原文：Korean automakers Hyundai and Kia on Tuesday agreed to retrofit more than 4 million U.S. vehicles to address theft concerns and install prevention equipment on all new vehicles to resolve an investigation by a bipartisan coalition of 35 attorneys general.】

item.title: 福特电动车的退缩凸显行业困境：为美国还是为全球制造？
item.description: 特朗普政府取消了电动汽车补贴，并放宽了对尾气污染的限制，福特反映了汽车企业高管在这些政策出台后面临的更大难题。【原文：Ford reflects the broader conundrum facing auto executives in the wake of Trump-administration policies that stripped the industry of EV subsidies and eased restrictions on tailpipe pollution.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，瑞士巴里卡乐宝公司有意在价格波动中分拆可可部门
item.description: 据三位熟悉内情的人士透露，全球最大的巧克力制造商巴里-卡乐堡（Barry Callebaut）正处于探索将其全球可可部门从集团其他部门分离出来的早期阶段。【原文：The world’s biggest chocolate maker Barry Callebaut is in the early stages of exploring the separation of its global cocoa unit from the rest of the group, according to three people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国联邦航空局将斥资 60 亿美元购置空中交通电信和雷达系统
item.description: 美国联邦航空管理局局长周二表示，该局将在今年年底前投入 60 亿美元，用于新的空中交通管制电信基础设施和雷达监控系统，这些系统将在 2028 年底前部署完毕。【原文：The head of the Federal Aviation Administration said Tuesday the agency is committing $6 billion by the end of the year on new air traffic control telecom infrastructure and radar surveillance systems that will be deployed by the end of 2028.】

item.title: ReNew 与谷歌签订协议，在印度建设 150 兆瓦太阳能项目
item.description: 印度 ReNew Energy Global 公司周二表示，它已与 Alphabet 旗下的谷歌公司签署了一项长期协议，将在印度西部的拉贾斯坦邦开发一个 150 兆瓦的太阳能项目。【原文：India's ReNew Energy Global said on Tuesday it has signed a long-term deal with Alphabet's Google to develop a 150-megawatt solar project in the western Indian state of Rajasthan.】

item.title: 巴西国家石油公司工会称罢工第二天袭击平台和炼油厂
item.description: 巴西国营石油公司工会 FUP 在一份声明中说，巴西国营石油公司的罢工星期二进入第二天，影响到 24 个石油平台和 8 个炼油厂。【原文：A strike at Brazilian state-run oil company Petrobras entered its second day on Tuesday, affecting 24 oil platforms and eight refineries, union FUP said in a statement.】

item.title: 2026 年，人工智能热潮将使芯片制造设备销售额增长 9%，达到 1260 亿美元
item.description: 据行业组织 SEMI 周二预测，随着芯片制造商扩大用于人工智能的逻辑和存储芯片的产能，用于制造计算机芯片晶圆的设备的销售额将在 2026 年增长约 9%，达到 1,260 亿美元，并在 2027 年进一步增长 7.3%，达到 1,350 亿美元。【原文：Sales of equipment used to make computer chip wafers will rise about 9% to $126 billion in 2026 and a further 7.3% to $135 billion in 2027, as chipmakers expand capacity for logic and memory chips used in artificial intelligence, industry group SEMI forecast on Tuesday.】

item.title: 谁是卡夫亨氏的新任高管？
item.description: 卡夫亨氏（Kraft Heinz）周二任命前凯洛格（Kellogg）高层史蒂夫-卡希莱恩（Steve Cahillane）为首席执行官，帮助领导这家包装产品巨头的分拆计划。【原文：Kraft Heinz on Tuesday named former Kellogg top boss Steve Cahillane as CEO to help spearhead the packaged goods giant's planned split.】

item.title: 美国 9 月商业库存增幅略超预期
item.description: 9 月份美国企业库存的增幅略高于预期，这表明库存可能会促进第三季度的经济增长。【原文：U.S. business inventories increased slightly more than expected in September, suggesting inventories probably added to economic growth in the third quarter.】

item.title: Mozilla 任命内部人士 Enzor-DeMeo 为首席执行官，希望为火狐浏览器添加人工智能功能
item.description: 火狐浏览器开发商 Mozilla 周二表示，公司已任命内部人士 Anthony Enzor-DeMeo 担任首席执行官，以应对人工智能产品给浏览器市场带来的变化。【原文：Firefox developer Mozilla on Tuesday said it has appointed insider Anthony Enzor-DeMeo as its CEO, as the company navigates changes in the browser market brought on by artificial intelligence products.】

item.title: EMJ 的杰克逊通过反向并购推行加密货币财政战略
item.description: 基金经理兼激进投资者埃里克-杰克逊（Eric Jackson）在与宠物健康公司 SRx Health Solutions 反向合并后，将成为一家加密货币财务公司的负责人，这使得该公司股价在周二早盘交易中飙升。【原文：Fund manager and activist investor Eric Jackson is set to head a crypto treasury firm following a reverse merger with pet wellness company SRx Health Solutions , sending the company's shares soaring in early trading on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美国 12 月商业活动增长创 6 个月新低
item.description: 周二的调查数据显示，12月份美国商业活动增长放缓，创下自6月份以来的最弱增速，制造商和服务提供商的新订单均出现下滑，为美国经济一年来的波动和不确定性画上了句号。【原文：U.S. business activity growth slowed in December to the weakest pace since June, with new orders sliding for both manufacturers and service providers to cap a year of volatility and uncertainty for the American economy, survey data showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 亚马逊高管退休后，Humana 将任命其为保险部门主管
item.description: Humana 周二表示，乔治-雷诺丁（George Renaudin）将辞去保险部门总裁一职，并任命亚马逊医疗保健高管亚伦-马丁（Aaron Martin）为其继任者。【原文：Humana said on Tuesday that George Renaudin will step down as president of its insurance segment and named Amazon healthcare executive Aaron Martin as his successor.】

item.title: 福特 195 亿美元电动汽车减记预示着传统汽车制造商前路艰难
item.description: 分析师周二表示，福特因重启电动汽车业务而减记 195 亿美元，这凸显了传统汽车制造商在应对需求减弱和监管背景变化时面临的日益严峻的挑战。【原文：Ford's $19.5 billion writedown tied to a reset of its electric-vehicle business highlights the mounting challenges for legacy automakers as they navigate waning demand and a changed regulatory backdrop, analysts said on Tuesday.】

item.title: VIEW 11 月就业增长超出预期，10 月零售销售额持平
item.description: 11 月份，美国就业增长速度在上月下降后出现反弹，但失业率上升至 4.6%，表明劳动力市场继续呈现疲软迹象，而美联储 1 月份不太可能降息的预期基本保持不变。【原文：The pace of U.S. job growth rebounded in November after a drop in the prior month, but the unemployment rate increased to 4.6%, indicating the labor market continues to show signs of softening, while expectations the Federal Reserve was unlikely to cut rates in January remained largely unchanged.】

item.title: 从趋势到主流：人工智能将巩固其在 2026 年投资战略中的核心地位
item.description: 全球券商在其对 2026 年的展望中指出，人工智能有望继续成为投资战略的核心，基准 S&P 500 指数有望在新的一年里继续上涨。【原文：Artificial intelligence is expected to remain the centerpiece of investment strategies, global brokerages outlined in their outlook for 2026, with the benchmark S&P 500 index on pace to post another year of gains.】

item.title: 就业数据公布后，美国利率期货短暂上调 1 月降息概率
item.description: 衡量银行间无担保隔夜贷款成本的联邦基金利率期货周二短暂提高了美联储在1月份下一次政策会议上降息的可能性，此前的数据显示美国上个月失业率有所上升。【原文：Futures on the federal funds rate, which measure the cost of unsecured overnight loans between banks, on Tuesday briefly raised the probability of the Federal Reserve cutting interest rates at the next policy meeting in January after data showed U.S. unemployment rose last month.】
